abstract: Like a balding hipster who imitates a young trendsetter’s style, Facebook is updating itself to look a lot more like Twitter.
snippet: Like a balding hipster who imitates a young trendsetter’s style, Facebook is updating itself to look a lot more like Twitter.
lead_paragraph: Like a balding hipster who imitates a young trendsetter’s style, Facebook is updating itself to look a lot more like Twitter, The New York Times’s Claire Cain Miller writes.

headline.main: Facebook Is Going for Some Twitter Sensibility
